column4: hello, I installed ubuntu 8.10 on a ibook g3 (powerpc) I have a blank screen at startup; looking some posts on-line the only solution is reinstall 8.04, but I'm doing a network install, there is no other solutions? I can't do the network install again. at the boot prompt just say linux or old the options Linux nosplash video=radeonfb won't work

hello, I installed ubuntu 8.10 on a ibook g3 (powerpc) I have a blank screen at startup; looking some posts on-line the only solution is reinstall 8.04, but I'm doing a network install, there is no other solutions? I can't do the network install again. at the boot prompt just say linux or old the options Linux nosplash video=radeonfb won't work
if you don't object to KDE, maybe 'kubuntu' will work -- i had better luck with it for my laptop (though a PC one) than with ubuntu
(that is, if you can try another distro)
